definitions: in a manner that shows an unwillingness to exert oneself physically

examples.text: he had been lounging lazily on a large rock
she yawned lazily in the luxurious comfort of her bed

shortDefinitions: in manner that shows unwillingness to exert oneself physically

definitions: with a lack of care or concern

examples.text: you lazily assume that democracies are Western
the river meanders lazily through willow-lined embankments
cotton from the trees drifted lazily in the heavy air
